page.title: 11LIFE IN LEASOWE (PAGE 1)
page.content: A group of mothers from the estate held a forum with our class to discuss life on the Leasowe Estate.Here are some extracts from the discussion. {How good do you consider the shopping {facilities to be? There has been an improvement since the new shopping block was built,but there is a real need for a chemist,as the nearest one is about 3 miles away. There is also need for a launderette. {Do you enjoy living in Leasowe? Yes,we find that people are friendly and look after each other.The estate has improved greatly over the last few years.There is less rubbish thrown about and less vandalism(although it's still bad).The council are too slow in completing repairs,and unemployment is high,but that's true in many places. { {(contd.) }
